name: lemon
content:
lemon noun
(FRUIT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 [ C or U ] an oval fruit that has a thick, yellow skin and sour juice, or the small tree on which this fruit grows: For this recipe you need the juice of two lemons. Would you like a slice of lemon in your tea? lemon juice a lemon grove (= group of lemon trees)
magnetcreative/E+/GettyImages
[ U ] the juice of a lemon or a drink made from this juice
More examplesFewer examplesIs there any of that lemon cake left?A margarita is made with tequila, an orange liqueur and lime or lemon juice.The dessert was decorated with strips of lemon peel.Purists eat smoked salmon with nothing more than lemon and black pepper.Just roast the chicken in the oven and baste it in oil and lemon.There was a lemon tree in the centre of the courtyard.

lemon noun
(STUPID THING/PERSON)
